properties.value: The rune platebody is a platebody made from runite bars. It is the best platebody that players are able to smith, granting 375 experience. Making a rune platebody requires 99 Smithing, 5 runite bars, and a hammer. To wear a rune platebody, players must have completed the Dragon Slayer I quest and have 40 Defence.

Item ID1127

The rune platebody is a platebody made from runite bars. It is the best platebody that players are able to smith, granting 375 experience. Making a rune platebody requires 99 Smithing, 5 runite bars, and a hammer. To wear a rune platebody, players must have completed the Dragon Slayer I quest and have 40 Defence.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-30-15
 Defence bonuses
+82+80+72-6+80
 Other bonusesSlot

Treasure Trails[edit | edit source]

Tier Emotes STASH Location Items Cost
Hard Blow Kiss Inside the bank of Shilo Village 54,641
Hard Salute Northern part of the Hosidius mess, near Ewesey 77,464
Master Panic South-east corner of Lava Dragon Isle by the big egg 624,600

The rune platebody is the item Falo requires players to show him when he sings about: To slay a dragon you must first do, before this chest piece can be put on you.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The platebody's ranged attack bonus has been decreased from -10 to -15.

30 January 2006
(update)

The item's examine was changed from undefined ("It's a Rune platebody.") to "Provides excellent protection."

7 March 2005
(update)

The item was graphically updated.
